name: Ahista Tea
slogan: Progressive Teas. Culturally Inspired Blends. Contemporary Ceramics
description:
Each year, we assemble a collection of bespoke blends and experimental, progressive teas from India and regions that are historically influenced by Indian culture. We look for skillfully crafted leaves from clean growing regions – teas with structure, texture, and complexity.

With a minimalist approach, we aim to elevate experiences at Michelin-starred restaurants, luxury boutique hotels and cafés around the world. Be inspired by the beauty of simplicity and the art of slow living.

team.title: Founder and Creative Director
team.name: Ashmit Patel
team.bioHtml: Founder and Creative Director of Ahista Tea.

jobs.title: Sales Representative (Commission Based)
jobs.description:
Ahista Tea is a luxury retailer that specializes in skillfully crafted, small-batch, premium teas and contemporary ceramics. We lovingly craft, pack and ship our precious items from India (and now Canada!) to around the world. Since our launch 1 year ago, we have been able to sell our teas to customers in 45 countries (and counting!)

We’re looking for a salesperson to join our small team. We believe you're a perfect fit for us if you share these skill-sets:

- Broad, global experience
- Cultural awareness
- Problem solving skills
- Adaptability
- Appreciation of diversity
- Initiative
- Social responsibility

Through your existing network or relationships, we're looking to increase the number of wholesale accounts in our portfolio and continue to acquire retail customers. Be a go-getter, represent our beautiful brand and mission, and let's continue to share more cuppas around the world!

Knowledge of tea is not required. 

We will provide you with the necessary materials to make the learning process fun and enjoyable. Over time, we will train all of your senses to ascertain what quality tea looks, smells, and tastes like.
